title: How to Make Pups in a Blanket

steps.headline: Pre-heat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C) if you are using the "Ready-to-Bake" rolls or 400 °F (204 °C) if you are using any other pastry dough.
Cook the hot dogs until they are brown.
steps.description: You can use a skillet if you are using tofu hot dogs or you can boil meat hot dogs in water.

steps.headline: Wait until the dough is defrosted, soft, and easy to handle.
steps.description: You don't want the dough to break while rolling it.

steps.headline: Place a hot dog, piece of cheese, and vegetables in the dough piece.
Roll the dough piece like a cigar.
Cut the dough pieces into smaller and "Toddler-friendly" size pieces.
Bake in the oven for 10 to 12 minutes for the "Ready-to-Bake" and 25 minutes for the other dough products.

text: Pre-heat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C) if you are using the "Ready-to-Bake" rolls or 400 °F (204 °C) if you are using any other pastry dough.  Cook the hot dogs until they are brown. You can use a skillet if you are using tofu hot dogs or you can boil meat hot dogs in water. Wait until the dough is defrosted, soft, and easy to handle. You don't want the dough to break while rolling it. Place a hot dog, piece of cheese, and vegetables in the dough piece.  Roll the dough piece like a cigar.  Cut the dough pieces into smaller and "Toddler-friendly" size pieces.  Bake in the oven for 10 to 12 minutes for the "Ready-to-Bake" and 25 minutes for the other dough products.  Finished.
